# AVCaptureDevice.SystemUserInterface.videoEffects

**Case**

The system user interface for changing the state of video effects.

## Declaration

```swift
case videoEffects
```

## User interfaces

- **AVCaptureDevice.SystemUserInterface.microphoneModes**: The system user interface for selecting microphone modes.
